name: No More Money - Season 1
description:
After your landlord loses his company, you and your household are forced move to another city and start from scratch. You’re 20 years old so it’s only fair that you find a job and try to help in any way you can.
Be mindful of which job you choose because this could change your life forever. One job could make you a good, loving person who cares deeply for the people around you, while the other might take you down a dark path to become someone who doesn’t believe in love and only enjoys meaningless sex.
Every choice you make matters and could lead you to finding true love with the perfect girl/girls, or maybe you just want some exciting adventures with anyone you can get your hands on.
Just after you start getting used to your new life, you begin to realize that there are a lot of things happening in the shadows around you and your new goal is to become the hero. But be careful, or you just might become the villain instead.
Starting a new life is never easy, but there are a lot of girls who just might make this transition a little smoother. Or at least more enjoyable. Each of these girls have their own story, plans, dreams and personalities. I hope you'll enjoy spending time with them.
The first season contains 6 episode packed with 2500 renders and around 100 animations. In the first season you'll just get to know the girls better and understand the story, that's why it's free and has less content. The other seasons will have more content, but you'll have to buy them
Season 2, and future seasons, will continue the story and be released and sold separately as DLC.
